import React from 'react' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' function Blogs(props) { const location = useLocation(); const blog = location.state.from console.log(blog.uid) return (

{blog.blog.title}

{blog.blog.description}

Author: {blog.blog.author}

Original url for blog {blog.blog.url}

{blog.blog.content}

) } export default Blogs
